ViewDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: HTML View Data Form
ViewDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: A data form for viewing html records
ViewDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Styons Software

SPDataForm.c:CreateProcedureSQL: CREATE PROCEDURE USR_SSC_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_VIEW_HTML ( @ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,@DATALOADED BIT = 0 OUTPUT ,@HTMLFIELD NVARCHAR(MAX) = NULL OUTPUT ) AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON SET @DATALOADED = 1 SELECT @HTMLFIELD = HTMLNOTE FROM CONSTITUENTNOTE WHERE ID = @ID RETURN 0 END
